name: T.W. Burgess Presents: PYLONS
description:
Its a beautiful day to play in the countryside! Just make sure to not play near the PYLONS.

Abandoned in the late 70's and restored today for all to play! Play PYLONS and learn of all the safe ways to avoid an accidental death by PYLONS.

PYLONS  will be available for folks to suffer through play through on October 22!
